# faridteymouri.vercel.app

> Personal Portfolio & Professional Profile  
This site showcases Farid Teymouri’s 16+ years of expertise in software engineering, DevOps, web security, and full-stack development — with a focus on Laravel, Nuxt.js, secure architectures, and custom web solutions.

## Main Content
[About](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/): Overview of professional background, technical skills, and career journey from security researcher to full-stack developer.

[Experience](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/#about): Detailed timeline of roles in penetration testing groups, freelance projects, and a 3-year personal Laravel-Nuxt initiative.

[Skills](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/#skills): Comprehensive list of technical competencies including Laravel, Nuxt.js, SQL Server, API design, WHMCS development, DevOps, and web hardening.

[Projects](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/projects): Highlights of key contributions including SQL Server optimizations for 'holoo' accounting software, WHMCS modules, custom CMS development, and security implementations.

[Blog](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/blog): Educational articles, technical guides, and updates on open-source tools, web security practices, and modern development workflows.

[Contact](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/): Professional inquiry point for collaboration, consulting, or technical discussions.

## Optional Content
[DevOps & Security](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/): Insights into server hardening, firewall configuration, secure deployment pipelines, and defensive architecture.

[Laravel & Nuxt Stack](https://faridteymouri.vercel.app/): Technical deep dive into the personal full-stack project built with Laravel (backend) and Nuxt.js (frontend).
